Item ID5769

A calquat keg is use to collect completed brewing ales and cider from the barrel next to fermenting vats. Two calquat kegs are required to empty a barrel, each keg containing four pints compared to beer glasses single pint.

They are created by using a knife on a calquat fruit picked from calquat trees, requiring 72 Farming to grow.

Ales in beer glasses cannot be used to fill a calquat keg.

[[File:Calquat keg detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''calquat keg''' is use to collect completed [[brewing]] [[ale]]s and [[cider]] from the barrel next to [[fermenting vat]]s. Two calquat kegs are required to empty a barrel, each keg containing four pints compared to [[beer glass]]es single pint.

They are created by using a [[knife]] on a [[calquat fruit]] picked from [[calquat tree]]s, requiring 72 [[Farming]] to grow.

[[Ale]]s in beer glasses '''cannot''' be used to fill a calquat keg.

}}
